_Type.description: Type is currently supported only for ObjectCell.

_Name.description: The unique name for the action button.

Text.description: The text displayed on the action button only on the iOS platform. It will be displayed when `Image` is defined and `Title`, `SubHead` and `Footnote` are defined for Object Cell.

Image.description: The image to display in the action button.

Style.description: A style that will be applied to the action button. MDK supports `background-color` and `font-color` for icon.

Mode.description: Constants indicating the style information that is applied to the action button. `Deletion` means an action that deletes data or performs some type of destructive task.

OnSwipe.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the user selects the action
